## Werft options:

- [ ] /werft with-local-preview
      If enabled this will build `install/preview`
- [ ] /werft with-preview
- [ ] /werft with-large-vm
- [ ] /werft with-integration-tests=all
      Valid options are `all`, `workspace`, `webapp`, `ide`, `jetbrains`, `vscode`, `ssh`
